Introduction

BeBe Mignon was a Korean pop female trio that debuted in 2010. Before their debut, they were described as the female version of 4Men. The trio was under the labels YWHO Enterprise and Happyface Entertainment. The group disbanded in 2011 after Ga Eul left the group.
